Function Documentation

int i2c_close ( port_t  port)

This functions closes the specified I2C port.

int i2c_getattr ( port_t  port,
i2c_attr_t *  attr 
)

This function gets the I2C attributes from the specified I2C port.

int i2c_geterr ( port_t  port)

This function get the error value for the most recent transaction.

int i2c_open ( port_t  port)

This function opens the specified I2C port (e.g. /dev/i2c0).

int i2c_read ( port_t  port,
int  loc,
void *  buf,
int  nbyte 
)

This function reads data from the I2C port.

int i2c_setattr ( const port_t  port,
const i2c_attr_t *  attr 
)

This function sets the I2C attributes.

int i2c_setup ( const port_t  port,
const i2c_reqattr_t *  req 
)

This function sets up an I2C transaction according to req.

int i2c_write ( port_t  port,
int  loc,
const void *  buf,
int  nbyte 
)

This function writes data to the I2C port.
